title: F.A.Q.s
subtitle: Frequently asked questions
content: As we continue to learn, grow and become more knowledgable on all things finance, here a few simple defintions and thoughts to get you started, motivated and integrated with the professionals.

questions.title: Where Does Fintank Get Its Data From?
questions.content: Fintank was created with the retail investor in mind, providing them with tools and the equipment for the investment world. Our data is sourced from Financial Modelling Prep, link found at https://site.financialmodelingprep.com/.

questions.title: How Does Fintank Verify Its Data ?
questions.content: While There are many different data sources for financial data all with different methodologies for measuring and calculating many of the metrics available, Fintank compares its data from its providers with other data sources to ensure that data is in line with estimates of the wider investment community.

questions.content: Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame.

questions.title: Remote areas - delivery
questions.content: He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before.
